item.title: No title
item.description: The latest Tweets from sterling (@Sterfrii). || I'm a teller of stories-you pick the medium || Contact: SterfriiOfficial@gmail.com || @Decypheredmusic @TheUntz @SINE_Media || University of TN Alum ||

item.title: The best year of BassLights yet: Bassnectar, Pretty Lights top in 2015
item.description:
The best year of BassLights yet: Bassnectar, Pretty Lights top in 2015

Warning: Although I'm a critic, I'm obviously a fan. As with all things music, opinion is unavoidable, which is why I've included my personal insights to hopefully gain your trust. I had just turned 16, my friend's parents were out of town and we weren't "up to no good"-we were just sitting around and hanging out together when I was shown a song that would forever change my life.

item.title: 150 pics from the BUKU Project including the Pretty Lights secret set!
item.description:
150 pics from the BUKU Project including the Pretty Lights secret set!

Imagine being immersed in the classic arts and Creole culture of New Orleans. Now imagine the fun, free-loving vibes of a music festival. When the two of these atmospheres collide, you're given BUKU Music + Art Project -and another remarkable year is officially in the books.

item.title: Can't stop the SCamp: 2016 brought Big GrizMatik, Menert band and more
item.description:
Can't stop the SCamp: 2016 brought Big GrizMatik, Menert band and more

Few music festivals nowadays remember to emphasize the true spirit of music, which is bringing people together-fans and artists alike-all collaborating to have a good time and shake their bodies. Summer Camp Music Festival has been around longer than Bonnaroo for this and countless other reasons.
